targets.query:
from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["product_type"] == "abap")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if "${PROJECT}" == "ALL" then r["project"] =~/$/ else  r["project"] == "${PROJECT}")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "abap_isup" and r._value == 0)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if "${PROJECT}" == "ALL" then r["project"] =~/$/ else  r["project"] == "${PROJECT}")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "site_isup" and r._value == 0)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "abap_isup")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sap_memory_total" or r["_field"] == "sap_memory_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_wp_info"] == "sap_wp_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wp_dia_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_dia_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "abap_stuck_jobs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_wp_info"] == "sap_wp_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wp_bgd_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_bgd_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "isupdate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_wp_info"] == "sap_wp_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wp_spo_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_spo_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_wp_info"] == "sap_wp_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wp_upd_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_upd_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "isupdate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtime_background" or r["_field"]  == "rtime_dialog" or r["_field"] == "rtime_http" or r["_field"] == "rtime_https" or r["_field"] == "rtime_rfc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] > 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffer_hitratio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "isupdate")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "alerts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hana"] == "hana")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ALERT_NAME" or r["_field"] == "ALERT_RATING")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "security")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hardening"] == "hardening")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["abap_parameters"] == "abap_parameters")    
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["sap_sid"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "security")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hardening"] == "hardening")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["icm_info"] == "icm_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["instance_id"] == "${INSTANCE_ID}")
  |> toString()
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "horus")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and r._field == "wp_dia_running")
    |> group(columns: ["sap_sid"])
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "sap_sid"])

from(bucket: "horus")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and r._field == "wp_bgd_running")
    |> group(columns: ["sap_sid"])
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "sap_sid"])

from(bucket: "horus")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and r._field == "wp_upd_running")
    |> group(columns: ["sap_sid"])
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "sap_sid"])

from(bucket: "horus")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and r._field == "wp_spo_running")
    |> group(columns: ["sap_sid"])
    |> last()
    |> group()
    |> keep(columns: ["_value", "sap_sid"])

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_wp_info"] == "sap_wp_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "wp_dia_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_dia_total" or r["_field"] == "wp_bgd_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_bgd_total" or r["_field"] == "wp_upd_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_upd_total" or r["_field"] == "wp_spo_running" or r["_field"] == "wp_spo_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_sid"] == "${SID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> drop(columns: ["column", "url"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "site_isup")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["product_type"] == "abap")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "abap_isup" and r._value == 0)

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> drop(columns: ["column", "url"])
  |> last()  
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "site_isup" and r._value == 0)

reduceOptions.fields: /^sap_memory_used \{environment="pro", fqdn="192\.168\.50\.179", product_type="abap", sap_client="001", sap_memory="sap_memory", sap_sid="NPL", sap_sysn="00"\}$/

targets.query:
from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sap_memory_total" or r["_field"] == "sap_memory_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_sid"] == "${SID}")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "monitoring")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "http")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sid"] == "${SID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "horus")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffer_hitratio")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sap_sid"] == "${SID}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "horus")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and  r["project"] == "${PROJECT}")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> group()
|> distinct(column: "instance_id")
list.label: INSTANCE_ID
list.name: INSTANCE_ID
list.query:
from(bucket: "horus")
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "monitoring" and  r["project"] == "${PROJECT}")
|> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
|> group()
|> distinct(column: "instance_id")
